title: Mili and the Dragonfly: Empathy Book
description: Others have feelings too!Young children often struggle with this concept.In this story, Mili's perfectly fun playdate was disrupted by a little dragonfly! Mili was so frustrated! Would she spare the dragonfly's life?A little thought to what the dragonfly was feeling made all the difference in Mili's reaction...When a child understands empathy, compassion just follows.Read this story to help kids exercise their empathy muscles!(Free learning resources based on this book can be found at www.authordivya.com/empathy for further learning and fun!)
author: Divya Mohan
